concept.title: Salesforce
concept.shortdesc: The Salesforce origin reads data from Salesforce.

conbody.p: originsSalesforceSalesforce originoverviewWhen you configure the Salesforce origin, you define connection information that the origin uses to connect to Salesforce, including the API type that the origin uses to connect to Salesforce. By default, the origin uses Salesforce API version 36.0. You can change the API version if needed.
You can configure the origin to read data in one or both of the following ways:

ul.li: Execute a query to read existing data from Salesforce.
Subscribe to the Force.com Streaming API to receive notifications for changes to Salesforce data.

conbody.p: When processing existing data, you can configure the origin to query Salesforce at regular intervals. You cannot use repeating queries when subscribed to notifications. When repeating a query, the origin can perform a full or incremental read.
